caption:
🔥🔥 The Spirit of Vengeance rides again! 🔥🔥 This Ghost Rider I blank sketch variant is pure fire, with BossKong’s insane detail bringing the heat on both covers! From the roaring flames to the raw attitude, this is next-level comic artistry! 🔥💀⚡️

💀 Front Cover: The Ghost Rider in all his flaming glory, chains in hand, ready to unleash hell! 🔥⛓️
💀 Back Cover: "Spirits of Vengeance - NOMAD" patch-style design, dripping with menace and attitude!

Would you rock this on your shelf or display it in a frame? Drop a 🔥 in the comments if you're feeling the heat! 👇👇
